title: 关于
txt_content:
我想让一个带着保护I叫“铁装备”的铁头盔的玩家穿上铁全套放五个命令方块，第一个先testfor那个玩家，比较器输出信号，给第二、三、四、五个命令方块，剩下几个命令方块里面该输入什么？
我想分别输入
/replaceitem entity @a slot.armor.head minecraft:iron_helmet 1 0
/replaceitem entity @a slot.armor.chest minecraft:iron_chestplate 1 0
/replaceitem entity @a slot.armor.legs minecraft:iron_leggings 1 0
/replaceitem entity @a slot.armor.feet minecraft:iron_boots 1 0
但问题来了,@a会给全部玩家，所以后面应该加些什么
/replaceitem entity @a[?] slot.armor.head minecraft:iron_helmet 1 0
/replaceitem entity @a[?] slot.armor.chest minecraft:iron_chestplate 1 0
/replaceitem entity @a[?] slot.armor.legs minecraft:iron_leggings 1 0
/replaceitem entity @a[?] slot.armor.feet minecraft:iron_boots 1 0

"?"中该填什么呢？

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 或许可以给那个玩家的计分板加1分，然后在@a[score_name=1,score_name_min=1]
